price: Say [O Prophet], “I do not ask you for any reward for it, nor do I pretend to be what I am not.
arabic: قُلۡ مَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَكَلِّفِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul mā asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin wamā anā mina al-mutakalifīna
